reviews.title: Whiskey Barrel Planters
reviews.review_text: The planters were exactly what I was looking for and looked nicer than expected when I received them. They are quite sturdy and should hold up well in yard. And delivery was awesome! Items were ordered just before midnight and were sitting on my door steps before noon the next day. That's service!

reviews.title: Great Big Barrel!
reviews.review_text: This barrel is HUGE! It's my new favorite thing! I wish I could buy 10 more like it. It looks nice and from farther away looks like wood, but it's much sturdier. I plan to grow a ton of peppers in this barrel and when the season is done, I'm planting a little Christmas tree. This is very worth the money if you need a giant barrel.

I have purchased these before and liked them a lot. I really like the rustic country ambience. I have them in doors right now because I am waiting until the weather stays warm outside. I am growing Zinnias in them. I was going to plant them in ground but decided to go with these pots instead. Great look. Great value. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Sturdy and huge!!
reviews.review_text: This was JUST what I wanted to plant some gladiola bulbs! You can easily poke holes in the bottom for drainage and it is definitely deep enough for the long legged flowers... I'm excited for them to bloom! This planter is really sturdy and should last for many years to come!

reviews.title: Works great as a water feature
reviews.review_text: Made this into a really cute water feature with a solar pump… used a ceramic tile that looks like a piece of wood flooring and a fish that's made for fountains… Also added a water lily to float around on top of the water turned out super cute. Barrel/planter is the perfect size.

reviews.title: Better Homes %26 Gardens Whiskey Barrel pots ❤️
reviews.review_text: i have several of each size of these after ordering a few of each. Extremely sturdy and light when not filled. the biggest one 20" across is quite large, large bag of soil if purchased. what i like about the Whiskey barrel planters besides the look is the width to height. a lot of pots are taller then wide or skinny at the bottom with a large top making them TOP HEAVY if you have any plant with some decent foliage on them like > "fruit trees, elephant ears, banana plants will all do awesome in these Whiskey Barrel planters "and are here at my place"

reviews.title: What a Basket
reviews.review_text: These feel like nice quality resin. It's not cheap looking or fragile feeling. I love these for my young columnar apple tree, and larger tomatoes. This is the first year I'm using them so I don't have an opinion just yet about the durability. So far so good.

reviews.title: Instant growing spaces!
reviews.review_text: Whiskey barrel design without the weight makes these planters easy to handle. This year I bought 4 and previous years I had 4. Really great durability and functionality. I use for everything from blooming plants to herbs and tomatoes. They look great placed in the front flower and on the back deck. Drain holes are easily punched out due to placement in bottom of planter. Don't forget to get the wheeled bases sold separately because when filled, they are heavy.

reviews.title: Beautiful Whiskey Barrell Planter
reviews.review_text: I got this for a Plumeria that had outgrown its planter. I wanted more drainage holes so I drilled 12 holes around the bottom. It's a heavy duty planter that I believe will last for many years and the wide base keeps it stable. The wind can't blow it over. I recommend this to plant lovers everywhere.

reviews.title: Employees won't go out in rain
reviews.review_text: I had 2 strokes and I ordered dirt and sunflower seeds to pick up. Instead I am told to go to the grocery and get out and pick the stuff up there and put it in my car! I am 1/2 paralyzed and the group laughing and cutting up also said it was lightening and they could not go out. BUT, they had a little gal out there getting shopping carts. Now, who would get hit by lightening?!!!! I had to get another customer coming out to load my dirt! I hurt my hand trying to do this and I was charged a pick up/load fee? Refund that fee because they did not do the JOB! I DID!!!!!

reviews.title: GREAT sturdy containers @ a fair price !
reviews.review_text: Very sturdy attractive planters @ a fair price for their size ! I am currently using 4 of this size as part of my container gardening. Each is planted with a tomato plant . I used flowering nasturtiums around the perimeter to add some color. Note : Put them in place BEFORE you add the weight of soil ! They hold a lot !!!

reviews.title: Looks vs Efficiency
reviews.review_text: Drainage holes are so small and inadequate. Had to add more just to save my poor pothos from unalivement. I also wouldn't recommend adding holes as it's not that sturdy of plastic and done wrong you could end up cracking the barrel. Looks wise? Adorable Beginner friendly potter.

I refer the larger lighter colored barrel planters I got from Sam's for the same price but these will do for Fall. I live around oil wells so I plant all my plants/ shrubs in large. I picked up three lighter colored barrels %26 if I find them again I'll will buy more

really like this planter. the first one i ever brought roughly two years ago is still holding up, even after being outside in the florida elements. so naturally i purchased more. kinda hope they go on clearance soon so i can get one or two for my mom who also loves planta

reviews.title: Awesome barrels
reviews.review_text: I have so many of these in my garden. They are wonderful and so versatile. I have planted annuals, perennials, turned them into fairy gardens, used them for to hold garden hoses on made them into fountains and more. Durable and last for many seasons. Well worth the money.

reviews.title: Planter looks great at a great price
reviews.review_text: I wanted a large planter that was reasonably priced and this met both. It looks very nice and matches with my other whisky barrel planters that are a smaller size. it was easy to pop out the drain holes. It holds an entire bag of the condensed pro mix that is in the red cube, also from Walmart. I am very happy with this purchase. I totally recommend this product for the look and for the price.

reviews.title: 19in Barrel plant pot
reviews.review_text: Love the size for my outdoor floral plants was easy to pop out the holes for drainage or leave it on, love the barrel look design so if I prefer I could also place it on my deck for a beautiful display. I also like the sturdiness looks %26 seems stronger than my previous pot, will definitely purchase more when needed

reviews.title: sturdy, roomy, good buy
reviews.review_text: These are good, sturdy/ I like them for growing a few veggies on the upper decks where the deer cannot get at them. Just remember they hold a lot of potting soil (get some extra) and once they are filled you probably will not be able to lift them. May be good to put a plant dolly under it so it can roll. Knock holes work easily for good drainage.

reviews.title: Perfect Pots!
reviews.review_text: I love these tubs. They are a great size and very sturdy. I do a lot of planting in these pots, and they are perfect. Also, a very good deal, price wise. And I love my Walmart experience. I ordered them in the a.m., and they arrived that night. Great job!

These are great, wide, sturdy planters for larger plants, smaller trees, or bushes. Ideal for those with limited space that would like to start a butterfly flower garden. Attractive looking I'll be buying more. They could uses more drain holes as only two are supplied.

I needed a couple of large pots for patio shrubs. Our yard dirt sucks, so to salvage two recently purchased shrubs, I decided to place them on the patio. These tubs are perfect. And about 30 percent less than the big box stores. I can even put a trellis in them if I decide to. (one is a vine).

reviews.title: Container Garden
reviews.review_text: I like them very much. I am using them for container gardening. I like that rustic look perfect for that garden theme I'm doing. I've always like the barrel look. It has the knock out drainage holes to prevent rot. I will see how it turns out S the plants grow and produce. I planted squash, zucchini, cantaloupe, water melon and tomato's with onion sets in their same pots.

We do not recommend ordering this Barrel through Walmart because past month they have been refusing to look at the delivery photos that clearly shows when items are missing not refunding you. And don't even bother contacting the Billiing Dept as you'll just get hung up on. When I ordered this Barrel, the same one I had ordered before, along with 2 bags of Potting Mix, the delivery photo clearly showed only 2 items not the 3 items I paid Walmart for, yet they refuse to check the photo which is supposed to be the "Proof" though no longer do, as Walmart will not even refund when you have the delevery people themselves tell Wallmart the item was missing. Ordering this item was a repeated attempt that resulted in paying for an item I never recieved, not worth being disrespected every time I contacted Walmart, and this has been going on often, and to others in my area recently with online delivery orders. Therefore we do not recommend ordering this item, better to go in person to purchase it, though who wants to buy from a store who is not trustworthy online with your money!

reviews.title: Did not receive merchandise but was charged for it
reviews.review_text: This item was not delivered to my new address!!! When I ordered, I changed my address, phone number, and credit card....you only accepted the credit card change apparently. Please ship my purchase to the new address or refund the charge on my credit card.

I've now purchased several of these barrel style planters. They are resin instead of wood which I prefer. Wood doesn't seem to hold up over the years. It has drainage holes that need to be pushed out so plants are not sitting in too much water. I've bought a few different sizes and be3n d3light3d 24th all I%26 5h3m.

reviews.title: Very good planter
reviews.review_text: I really like this planter. It's light weight but sturdy and holds a nice quantity of soil and plants. I knocked the precut holes out of the bottom for drainage with no problem and set it on two bricks so it would have plenty of clearance on the bottom to drain. I woujd buy another one for more plants without hesitation.

reviews.title: Great quality! Great price point!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE these planters! :) They are a wonderful size for the price. You won't be sorry that you purchased them. They are made of thick plastic but I haven't had any issues with any of the ones I have purchased. I have had a few for a few years and they still look great! I cannot recommend these enough!

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: I was excited when I received the Better Homes Whiskey Barrels. I got two since they were on sale. Excellent buy and they look so nice. Great quality, fast shipping and they look better than the photos. The size is awesome, I placed four other planters of flowers in one barrel. The design is amazing.

reviews.title: Great Barrel Planters
reviews.review_text: My wife wanted some barrel planters for planting flowers around our home. These were perfect for us. They are large, but made from light weight resin material. They should be durable and hold up to the weather. They closely resemble a real oak barrel so it adds a nice touch. Great value, we highly recommend.

reviews.title: MULTI PURPOSE FLOWERPOT!
reviews.review_text: I GOT THIS FOR BULBS TO HAVE A SPOT, UNTIL I FIGURE OUT WHERE TO PLANT THEM. THEN I WILL PLANT A BANANA TREE IN IT SO I CAN BRING IT IN THE HOUSE IN THE WINTER. I LOVE THE SIZE AND IT'S PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS. IT HOLDS PLENTY OF SOIL WHICH IS GREAT! I'VE HAD ALL DIFFERENT KINDS OF FLOWERS IN MY OTHER ONES I HAVE. THE SIZE IS GREAT! AND IT'S VERY STEARDY I LIKE THAT. BE CREATIVE IT HAS MANY DIFFERENT USES! IT WORKED FOR KEEPING COLD DRINKS ON ICE WHEN I NEEDED TO HAVE A PLACE AT THE LAST MIN. VERY USEFUL POT!

reviews.title: Sturdy, looks nice, good product
reviews.review_text: I bought this, not for planting vegetables or flowers, but to make a garden water feature using a solar powered fountain. The size is perfect for some small water plants and it adds beautiful character to the front yard garden. It holds up well with the weight of the water and the wood look stands out. I absolutely love it! I plant to buy at least one more for the backyard too! Great product, fair and reasonable price. I used curbside pickup which was easy and the staff are always friendly and smiling. Thanks for another great shopping experience!

reviews.title: perfect and best quality for the price
reviews.review_text: i purchased 10 of the large barrel . love them and 1 small . i would have got more of the small ones too but they were out of stock. hopefully they will have them again next year
Never got item. Gentlemen answering phone could not find my order. Suggested to check with other store. Store on st Lucie west blvd. never answered the phone.

This is a very well made rustic looking barrel looking pot. I expect it to last for a few years at the very least. It is very large, I have a small palm tree that has outgrown its current pot. This one should last it a few years.

reviews.title: if you need a big pot this is what you want
reviews.review_text: bough t 2 of them at different times one i have had 2 seasons grew my rise and shine roses outside in them with potting soil till they need to be transplanted two pop out holes for drainage and no signs of weather damage and i live in Florida
These whiskey barrels look so much like the expensive ones and they are so inexpensive. I purshased three and they look so good two on my porch and one in the yard. The plants are growing like crazy.

iI bought it because it's big enough tu put my young fruit trees in it. i can bring it in during winter. They are plastic but it has an nice appearamce. The rather large, my trees have tripled in size. The best thing is they were less than $20..

reviews.title: Great planters
reviews.review_text: The planter pots are great and the right size for what plants that were used in them. Great price for two planter pots. Hoping to use them year after year. Thanks.

reviews.title: Better Homes %26 Gardens Whiskey Barrel Planters
reviews.review_text: I bought two of the 16" planters to repot a desert rose and a plumeria, both of which were rootbound. I already have four 20" matching planters. All of the planters are very sturdy and I expect them to last for years.

reviews.title: Perfect size for huge mums!
reviews.review_text: Holes on bottom of pot are easy to pop out and the size is big but perfect for transplanting my huge mums. They are large, taking up more than half of the side walk but the mums look happier.

reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE them! 5*****
reviews.review_text: WOW! These barrels are Huge! They're 20" in diameter and deep! If you buy 2 of them, you'll need a very large bag of soil!! They're also very nice looking! I'm super pleased with these barrels!
Wal-Mart did not send my complete order yet charged me for the items I did not receive. They have done this to me multiple times and their customer service was poor. Be careful ordering from them.

reviews.title: Light-weight, durable and just like the picture
reviews.review_text: It was exactly the right size I needed, and looked just like the picture. Plastic, with 2 holes that were easily punched out for drainage, and very light weight. I will probably purchase another just like it.

reviews.title: Much better than I expected- great summer barrel!
reviews.review_text: Great quality for the price- the appearance and sturdiness exceeded my expectations. Also, surprisingly easy to put in drainage holes with a screw driver...!

reviews.title: not very happy
reviews.review_text: i did not get what i ordered. i ordered a better homes nd garden whiskey barrel brown resin planter, 15.8in x 15.8x 10.3. what i got was a box of Bar's leak blown head gasket repair 33.8 fl. oz.

reviews.title: Nice big planters
reviews.review_text: I bought two of these and they came in looking great better than expected and bigger than expected. I bought them for large plantings and they are absolutely perfect and we're a fantastic price.

reviews.title: pricey now, but still good quality
reviews.review_text: The price, of course, it has I basically doubled since I last bought them. not happy about that, but glad you still have them. I do not baby them and they hold up really well.

reviews.title: Look nice, good product
reviews.review_text: Really like these and they look great in my garden. Will buy more next year. I got two last year and they are holding up outside bery well. And we had a pretty hardh winter then rainy season.

reviews.title: Young fruit tree pots
reviews.review_text: I pot my fruit trees in these until they are strong enough to transplant into the ground. The 20” wide works great for this and the price is reasonable.
Beautiful planter and very well priced compared to like planters at other retailers. I appreciated that there was an option to have drain holes in the bottom or leave them plugged.

reviews.title: great price. well made
reviews.review_text: bought because of price and size. these look great and feel well made. plugs at bottom were easy to pop out for water drainage. i now have 4 of these. 2 were bought 2 years ago and still look like new without any color fading

reviews.title: Beautiful large planters
reviews.review_text: Very big and sturdy! These are weather resistant and strong planters. They are also beautiful and complement my yard perfectly. Fast shipping from Walmart was awesome. Well done Better Homes and Gardens!

reviews.title: Awesome Planter
reviews.review_text: This planter is awesome. My neighbors love it too. The design is beautiful. The sturdiness in which it is made will last a long time. Its size holds 2 cubic feet of soil.

reviews.title: Great choice!
reviews.review_text: This planter is perfect for so many uses. Flowers, vegetables or anything else will be happy in this! The size is large enough to plant several contrasting colors of flowers, or a large tomato plant. And, the planter looks good!!

reviews.title: Small Gardening
reviews.review_text: This size is perfect for planting tomatoes, small garden items. I have seen them fade a little but it adds character and it seems sturdy. Reasonable price too.
There is nothing negative to say about this barrel planter. it would be perfect to plant flowers in. We bought it to make a barrel fountain. Worked great for that too.

reviews.title: used outside for wedding
reviews.review_text: an inexpensive way to use these for water bottles for a summer wedding for guests. These were perfect and looked really nice! They are a great size to fit several! I bought two and will use them for plants after.

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.review_text: I really like the wood look matched with the durability of this planter. It looks like a wood, but it is much lighter making this a perfect gift for my mother. The size was just right, not too big or too small . I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.title: Good price for large container
reviews.review_text: My Large rose bush needed a moveable home, we added extra holes for drainage and so far my rose bush is very happy. Plastic containers hold heat, so we placed it where it gets late afternoon sun.

reviews.title: worth the money and very pretty
reviews.review_text: I bought these, knowing I would have to drill a hole in the bottom for drainage. But they have been wonderful growing pots for my vegetables. I went and bought seven more.

reviews.title: Worth the money!
reviews.review_text: Really love the size of this pot. It looks like a barrel and is holding up well. We purchased two for our hibiscus plants. It has holes in the bottom which are very helpful for water drainage. Definitely worth the money.
under promised and over delivered. looks good,feels sturdy. you really have to get very close to it before you realize it's not actually wood. i plan on buying 2 more

Resin planters that look like wood whisky barrels are perfect for planting in this area. I'm a senior and find it difficult to move terra cotta pots full or empty. This planter is a very good quality and of substantial weight.

reviews.title: Buy everything from Amazon
reviews.review_text: Never received. walmart was no help at all. They told me to place a dispute with my credit card. This is one of the many reasons I buy almost everything now from Amazon.

reviews.title: Sturdy, large, durable
reviews.review_text: These are sturdy, large enough for Dwarf Trees. I have at least 10 of these. They've held up in the SE Florida sun for years. Definitely recommend. Good drainage in our rainy season. The barrel shape is attractive.

reviews.title: Half a barrel of fun!
reviews.review_text: Bought this clever look-a-like to transplant my Gardenia into, it's light weight, you can pick how much drainage you want and it looks great with my Gardenia in it! It is designed to hold up to rough weather which is another reason I picked it because I live in Florida -lots of heat and rain, hoping it lives up to the hype!

Great product! I love them. Well made and very sturdy. They hold a variety of really nice sized large plants. I've had a couple of these pots for 2yrs now and they haven't faded, warped or cracked in the sun. Very happy with this purchase and will be buying more.

planted two bleeding hear flower roots in it and they're doing great. the anesthetic of the pot is very nice and doesn't look cheaply made at all. im about to purchase two more for a couple of wisteria vines that will be forming an arch at the entrance of my fish pond.

reviews.title: Nice looking barrel planters
reviews.review_text: I have four of these and really like them. They look really good for being made of resin. They only have two small drain holes in the bottom so they don't drain as well as I'd like. You can probably drill extra holes if needed or make the two existing ones larger. I'd love to find these planters in a larger size if BH%26G makes them.

reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, quality planter. Very pleased.
reviews.review_text: These are actually a nice quality, sturdy structure, and measurements were accurate. Perfect for my gardening needs, and looks lovely in our yard. I plan to order more!! Kudo's I normally do not like to use plastic, but this product has a sturdy structure that will last over time, compared to many other plastic planters.

reviews.title: Another barrel to my collection of planters!
reviews.review_text: I thought I bought the same size barrel as last spring obviously not. I'm looking forward to putting plants in this barrel. I like the fact that it's not wooden so it won't rot and the other barrel which is larger and full of dirty and plants it's very easy to slide to move around my yard. It's not heavy at all but looks like it is. I still haven't taken plastic wrap that's on the smaller barrel off yet but the finish is nice and doesn't look fake during the day light

I previously ordered 3 of these items; I wanted to make sure I got a 4th one of the exact product. Searching your website was a deal breaker as I found the exact item with little effort on my part. Walmart is always the winner; Amazon can take a very long hike!!!

reviews.title: Looks great on porch
reviews.review_text: AS PICTURED and is now the home to my basil and parsley and chive garden. If using outside, you should drill holes in bottom for drainage. Good buy.

reviews.title: Sturdy barrels, great product
reviews.review_text: These are great plant barrels. I've purchased them a year ago and came back to purchase 3 more this year. They are sturdy, don't break easily and look great. They also don't fade, even in the Florida sun!

reviews.title: Really great buy!
reviews.review_text: The pots are really nice! I got them for my granddaughter's front porch. She really loved them! They look great with the flowers in them! Would recommend getting them. Really great buy for the money.

reviews.title: review
reviews.review_text: Bought 2 and both split in seams. One arrived split and the other one split when I put in soil. I should have returned but I'll figure out how to tie it together.

reviews.title: great planter
reviews.review_text: I was looking for nice barrel planter to plant some lilies and i found this. it is such nice planter and very sturdy. picture on here dont do it justice it is really nice.

reviews.title: My first choice for tomatoes.
reviews.review_text: I already had several and wanted to plant more. I drill a seep hole about 4" from the bottom, then straw or dead cactus leaves in the bottom, and soil, then potting soil, and plant a tomato. You do much better with a huge pot with tomatoes.
I am so pleased with the planter barrels. I can no longer care for my beds so I filled them with rocks and put plants in the barrels. Now, I can relax more and enjoy my yard. Thank you.

reviews.title: Sturdy
reviews.review_text: This container is very sturdy and well built. It took about 1.75 cubic feet of soil to fill it up (before settling). This container is gonna be great to grow sunflowers in this year!
I love these planters a good size for almost any vegetable. I planted about 3 cabbages in one , and broccoli in another they are durable. Will buy again. The price is great for the size.
These pots are nice. They don't take as much dirt as a wine barrel, but I can put just as many flowers in there that makes it look fuller so they're very pretty.

reviews.title: Great for container gardening!
reviews.review_text: Have used these to build a container garden in my backyard. They are just the right size, very sturdy, and the drainage holes are built in. I keep buying more as my garden grows! Extremely pleased with this product.

reviews.title: Light weight but sturdy barrel.
reviews.review_text: Good looking whiskey barrel and it is light enough for an older person to move around. Planted zinnia seeds and waiting for them to come up. Should look wonderful when they are flowering.

reviews.title: Nice pot Driver not so great I tip can wait 10 sec
reviews.review_text: It was an absolutely beautiful part and it works very well for what I wanted it or it was a little larger than I thought it was gonna be which is a plus not a negative, so thank you. Only problem. I had was The person doing the delivering they did not wait so that we could check the rest of the delivery and we asked them to just give us a couple of minutes and we didn't have everything we were supposed to have and that's why we and the second day they would give us a couple of seconds I believe the company needs to take a few seconds and teach your Employees to wait just a few minutes so that people can check for their items. Have a blessed weekend.

reviews.title: Deck garden vessel
reviews.review_text: These are timeless and neutral. Perfect for my deck garden! I add extra holes for better drainage. They are deep enough for blooming perennials. I put the pots on black caddies and plant stands of various heights to let the plants be the focal point vs the pots.

reviews.title: Quality and very large
reviews.review_text: It's large - if you are filling it with decorative items for the season plan for a lot. If you ar planting flowers or greenery, also plan for plenty. It's a good quality item. I didn't need to punch out the holes, so I can address how difficult that is, but they are present and formed to do so.

reviews.title: Very stylish, lightweight barrel option
reviews.review_text: The Better Homes & Gardens 20 inch Whiskey Barrel Planter is a lightweight but sturdy planter. The planter will hold approximately 3 cubic feet of soil, so for plants with will have deep roots, this will adequately accommodate those. You could also fill with other material and top with soil for shallow root plants. I am using it for starting my vegetables that I plan to transplant. The look is very classic and works well in my garden setting.

reviews.title: Glad I got and went back for more and again too!
reviews.review_text: I'm doing container gardens using these and setting up many different plants in these. I have a bunch all over my yard and I plan to get more. I love that these are solid until you pop the drain holes cuz I plan to use one as a pond to hold water and plants and another unplugged one as a bird bath 👏 Yes, I'd totally recommend! 👏👏👏

reviews.title: almost right
reviews.review_text: well built. didn't care for the location of the drain holes. they should be on the very lowest part but instead they put it on a slightly raised part and so there's water sitting in the bottom not draining fortunately I put rocks in there so it's going to help a bit but it should drain out completely.

These are great planters that I am using for dwarf trees. I've ordered two sets of two planters and they arrived nicely packaged. They are made of resin that looks like wood, but will hold up with rain and elements i've ordered two sets of two planters and they arrived nicely packaged. They are made of resin that looks like wood, but will hold up well. They have plugs in the bottom of the planter that are easily removed a they have plugs in the bottom of the planter that are easily removed and excess water can drain out. excess water can drain out. I would buy again

reviews.title: TOO BIG FOR IT'S OWN GOOD
reviews.review_text: This is so big and heavy it overwhelms rollers you MUST purchase separately. Appropriate type wheels should be an integral part of the unit. It's BETTER to pay a few extra bucks for a better engineered product than make repeated purchases of inadequate add on support items which in the long run increases customer DISsatisfaction in the original product. GET A CLUE WALMART
